item.description:
Greetings All!!
There were a LOT of people who for one reason or another had to cancel out on the original Mt W Summit assault hike. Other obligations, injuries, etc. This is an EXPLORATORY POSTING ONLY ! ! Looking to see if there are others who might be interested in re-scheduling later this month to do it. I also have run into an issue about possibly not making this trip right now and maybe doing it in a few weeks instead. So for those of you who had to cancel - if interested in a possible later date this month - please let me know AND comment. For others who were leary of it being too hard due to being both up and down, not enough experiance, etc. - it could also be done as a HALF TRIP ONLY. Do the hike up, ride the Cog Railway back down.

August 21st?
August 28th?
Maybe even Labor day weekend but I don't know if that really starts getting into fall weather on top yet or not.

PLEASE SEE NEW ACTUAL EVENT POSTING UNDER SAME TITLE
item.name: Mt Washington - Round 2 (exploratory meetup posting) SEE NEW EVENT POSTING
